Why should you learn Greek?

  • 57% of the Bulgarians who spend their holiday abroad choose Greece
  • Greece is one of the biggest trade partners of Bulgaria with a trade exchange of more than 3 billion euros
  • Greece offers excellent real estate investment opportunities
Angel is an excellent teacher. He has incredible patience and explains great the new material. I highly recommend his services! Ivan, 32
I wanted to learn some basic Greek for my vacation and signing up for classes with Angel turned out to be great decision. He also gave me some great travel tips for next summer! Gergana, 28
I needed to improve my level of Greek for the business communications that I have with my trade partner in Athens. Angel was flexible enough to accommodate my busy schedule. Georgi, 47
